entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
